changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE medic_kg.clinics ( id serial not null PRIMARY KEY , fullname varchar(255) not null, shortname varchar(255) not null, full_description varchar(500) not null, short_description varchar(135) not null, url_site varchar(255) not null, ownership varchar(255) not null , is_draft BOOLEAN default FALSE, user_id int UNIQUE, CONSTRAINT fk_clnics_users FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES medic_kg.users(id) );
